name: Ball Survival (3rD Dimension Games)
description:
You mistakenly kicked your ball into a mysterious hole, as water drops on the ball, it either increases in size or reduces in size, Set the ball to the target size by colliding with the water droplets, the ones with plus sign, increases the size the ones with minus sign reduces the ball size, the ones with 0 has no effect, Every jump without collision results in the ball reducing in size, the target size is indicated on screen, REACH AND MAINTAIN THE BALL SIZE TARGET BEFORE THE TIME COUNTS DOWN
           

Bug Fixes -- Fixed the Game failed bug after completing level 2
